settings.title: O’ahu, Hawai’i
settings.content: The Island of Oʻahu in Hawaii is often nicknamed, or translated as ‘The Gathering Place’. Its shoreline is 227 miles (365 km) long. Enjoy the best bits with Absorb Island’s picks.

settings.title: 4-Way Stretch
settings.content: Our patent pending terry weave, with the addition of Spandex, creates a significant 4-way stretch that allows for easy movement or all-day lounging.

settings.title: Organic and Recycled MaterialsEach
settings.content: Each product is made from organic cotton and recycled yarns without any harsh chemicals or pesticides.

settings.title: Smarter Terry
settings.content: Our terry with moisture-wicking finish is powered by our revolutionary, patent-pending Dri-Rite™ fabric technology, making it the first dual-knit terry to feature SILVADUR™ recycled yarns on the inside-looping and organic cotton on the outside that work together to optimize after-water dry time.

settings.title: Hygienic and Ultra-Durable
settings.content: We deeply understand the importance of freshness and durability when it comes to drying off.  Our recycled yarns have built-in SILVADUR™ antimicrobial and anti-odor technology for advanced protection against bacteria that causes smelly towel syndrome.

settings.title: Cooling Comfort
settings.content: Our moisture-wicking fabric accelerates the drying process by quickly drawing the moisture out from the inner layer to the fabric surface. Guaranteeing a cool, comfortable wear from the moment you throw us on.

settings.title: Absorb Island Vacations
settings.content: Our dual-knit terry with Dri-Rite technology is the first anti-odor, antimicrobial fabric with moisture-wicking finish to achieve optimal dry time. Quality and durability is at the forefront of our product.
